items.title: Material UI (MUI)
items.description: A popular React UI framework with ready-made components.

items.title: Ant Design
items.description: A design system with a comprehensive UI component library.

items.title: Chakra UI
items.description: A simple, modular and accessible component library.

items.description: Official Tailwind component library for beautiful UI.

items.description: Unstyled, accessible UI components for React.

items.title: Radix UI
items.description: Primitives for building high-quality design systems.

items.title: React Icons
items.description: Includes popular icon libraries like FontAwesome, Lucide, Feather, etc.

items.title: Heroicons
items.description: Beautiful hand-crafted SVG icons by the Tailwind team.

items.description: All DaisyUI themes with previews and theme codes.
